reviewText: I think this product is listed under the wrong DVD region (it works on my computer and X-box 360). I'm pretty sure it should work on all normal US DVD players. Sponge bob is awesome, the Chinese dubbing is superb, and the Chinese subtitles make it a really good practice tool for people studying Chinese who want to follow along with and study the dialogue. 5/5
I have a Region Six Chinese DVD player and the Chinese DVD player did not recognize and would not play the DVD.  (And obviously it did not play on a Region One U.S. DVD player either.)
